page.title: 09PORTSMOUTH HARD AREA
page.content: Portsmouth Hard area. Some of the{pubs}in Portsmouth {Hard}area are connected with the sea. They are called the Ship and Castle, the Ship Anson, the Ship Leonard and the Victory. There is a bus station and a railway station here from where twelve different bus services and many trains leave. London is only seventy five minutes away by train. There are lots of restaurants and cafes such as the Wimpy and Le Bon Apetit. Some of the pubs also sell food. The{Dockyard}is an interesting place to visit and the Main Gates and {Dockyard}Wall were built in 1711. In here you can see the Victory, the Mary Rose and two museums. From the Hard you can catch a ferry to the Isle of Wight or Gosport.
